Workflow.Name: Notification - Daily - Notice of Investigation and Deem Refusal
Workflow.Description: Sends notifications when the notice of Investigation or notice of deem refusal dates have hit the 30 day old mark for Investigators to act on the complaints.

LocalizedName.description: Notification - Daily - Notice of Investigation and Deem Refusal

Description.description: Sends notifications when the notice of Investigation or notice of deem refusal dates have hit the 30 day old mark for Investigators to act on the complaints.
